tuv.seg: Before the election, 5 panels are formed of candidates who represent vocational interests, namely, culture and education, agriculture, labour, industry and commerce, and administration

Cruthaítear 5 phainéal iarrthóirí roimh an toghchán, a fheidhmíonn ar son leasanna gairmiúla, is é sin an cultúr agus an t-oideachas, an talmhaíocht, an lucht saothair, an tionscal agus an tráchtáil, agus an riarachán
Each panel consists of 2 sub-panels – the Nominating Bodies sub-panel and the Oireachtas sub-panel
Tá 2 fho-phainéal ar gach aon phainéal – fo-phainéal na gComhlachtaí Ainmnithe agus fo-phainéal an Oireachtais
Candidates are nominated to the Nominating Bodies sub-panels by organisations that represent a particular vocational interest and are registered as nominating bodies for a particular panel
Is iad eagrais ag feidhmiú do leas gairmiúil éigin agus atá cláraithe mar chomhlachtaí ainmnithe i gcomhair painéil ar leith a ainmníonn iarrthóirí chun fo-phainéil na gComhlachtaí Ainmnithe
Candidates are nominated to the Oireachtas sub-panels by members of the Dáil and the outgoing members of the Seanad
Is iad na teachtaí Dála agus na Seanadóirí atá ag éirí as an Seanad a ainmníonn na hiarrthóirí d’fho-phainéil an Oireachtais
Once the nomination of Seanad panel candidates has taken place, the returning officer sends a list of the candidates nominated for each panel to each voter
Nuair atá na hiarrthóirí uilig don Seanad ainmnithe, cuireann an ceann comhaireamh liosta na n-iarrthóirí ainmnithe do gach painéal chuig gach vótálaí
The list will indicate the name of the candidate and the bodies or persons who nominated them
Beidh ainm an iarrthóra chomh maith le ainm na n-eagras nó na ndaoine a d'ainmnigh an iarrthóir ar an liosta seo
On the day of the poll, the returning officer sends each voter 5 ballot papers by registered post - one for each panel
Ar an lá vótála, cuireann an ceann comhaireamh litir chláraithe sa phost chuig gach vótálaí ina bhfuil cúig chinn de pháipéar ballóide - ceann do gach painéal
The ballot papers will show the names of the candidates in alphabetical order, their addresses and descriptions and the sub-panel they were nominated to
Beidh ainmneacha na n-iarrthóirí ar na páipéir bhallóide in ord aibítre, a seoltaí agus cur síos orthu chomh maith leis an bhfo-phainéal lena bhfuileadar ainmnithe
If the candidates have a political affiliation, this is not mentioned on the ballot paper
Má tá baint le páirtí polaitiúla ag iarrthóir, ní bhíonn sé seo luaite ar an bpáipéar ballóide
The voter marks the order of their choice of candidates and returns the ballot papers by registered post to the returning officer
Tugann an vótálaí vóta do na hiarrthóirí de réir a rogha féin agus cuireann sé/sí ar ais na páipéir bhallóide chuig an gceann comhaireamh i bpostas cláraithe
There is a separate count for each panel
Bíonn comhaireamh faoi leith ann do gach painéal
The candidates are elected according to the principle of proportional representation with single transferable vote
Déantar na hiarrthóirí a toghadh de réir hionadaíochta cionúirena ar mhodh an aonghutha inaistrithe
A quota of votes is calculated to work out the number of votes necessary to become a candidate
Déantar cuóta vótaí a áireamh le theacht ar an méid vótaí a theastaíonn le iarrthóir a thoghadh
If a candidate reaches the quota they are deemed elected
Má shroicheann iarrthóir an cuóta tá sé/sí tofa
If a candidate obtains more votes than the quota, the surplus will be distributed to the remaining candidates in accordance with the next preference shown on the ballot papers
Má bhíonn níos mó vótaí ag iarrthóir ná an cuóta déantar an fuílleach a roinnt idir na hiarrthóirí eile de réir an chéad rogha eile ar na páipéir bhallóide
If no candidate reaches the quota, the candidate with the least votes is eliminated and their votes are distributed according to the next preference shown on the ballot papers

Muna shroicheann aon iarrthóir an cuóta, cuirtear an t-iarrthóir leis an líon is lú vótaí as an áireamh agus roinntear a vótaí ar na hiarrthóirí eile de réir an chéad rogha eile ar na páipéir bhallóide
The number of candidates who can be elected from each panel are as follows;
Seo a leanas líon na n-iarrthóirí gur féidir a thoghadh as gach painéal;
• Cultural and educational panel - 5 members including at least 2 from each sub-panel
• Painéal cultúir agus oideachais - cúigear, san áireamh ar a laghad beirt ó gach fo-phainéal
• Agricultural panel - 11 members including at least 4 from each sub-panel
• Painéal Talmhaíochta - aon chomhalta déag , san áireamh ar a laghad ceathrar ó gach fo-phainéal
• Labour panel - 11 members including at least 4 from each sub-panel
• Painéal oibre - aon chomhalta déag, san áireamh ar a laghad ceathrar ó gach fo-phainéal
• Industrial and Commercial panel - 9 members including at least 3 from each sub-panel
• Painéal Tionscail agus Tráchtála - naonúr, san áireamh ar a laghad triúr ó gach fo-phainéal
• Administrative panel - 7 members including at least 3 from each sub-panel
• Painéal Riaracháin - seachtar san áireamh ar a laghad triúr ó gach fo-phainéal
If a Senator dies, resigns or is disqualified from the Seanad, the vacancy will be filled by a by-election
Má chailltear Seanadóir, má éiríonn sé/sí as oifig nó má dhéantar Seanadóir a dícháiliú ó Sheanad Éireann, líonfar an folúntas le fo-thoghchán
Only certain people can vote in Seanad panel elections
Tá vóta ag daoine áirithe i dtoghcháin phainéil don Seanad
• Members of the outgoing Seanad or
• Comhaltaí den Seanad atá ag éirí as oifig
• Members of county councils and city councils
• Comhaltaí comhairlí condae agus cathrach
Further information is available in the Department of Housing, Planning, Community and Local Government’s publication, How the Seanad is elected (pdf)
Tá a thuilleadh eolais ar fáil i bhfoilseachán na Roinne Tithíochta, Pleanála, Pobail agus Rialtais Áitiúil, An chaoi a thoghtar an Seanad (pdf)
